title: exljbris Flickr Pool
content:
Anthony Bellamare was so kind to initiate and set up this [exljbris Flickr Pool](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730055413/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/exljbris-fonts/pool/).  
We invite you to inspire others and showcase your work using exljbris Fonts.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730055413im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2988124281_f563767d46_5307.jpg)
  
<cite>Photo: Hugo Roussel (Studio Punkat)</cite>
author: Jos Buivenga
